description: Students expand their understanding of modern dance by building on the components of
Modern Dance I, adding attention to movement qualities, elements of space, dance
vocabulary and of technique with an emphasis on phrasing and sequencing movement. Some
sectionsmay also include a focus on performing skills.  Open to majors and other students
with instructor's permission. May be repeated with permission of instructor.
Offered each semester. Prerequisite: DANCE 111 and permission of instructor.
